main event: Witnesses observed a bright object in the sky over Syracuse, New York, which lasted less than 5 seconds.
interesting points: The object appeared as a bright light, brighter than a light bulb,It was white in color and emitted sparks behind it,The object disappeared like a flare going out,It was initially suspected to be a meteor, but the witnesses believed it was too low to be one,Witnesses included two individuals who reported their observation to the authorities.
sighted object: a bright white object shooting sparks
